tool_description: Retrieves current and historical weather data including temperature, precipitation, humidity, wind speed, and pressure for specified locations and time periods.

data_frequency.description: Data frequency: hourly, daily, or weekly

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date, and dates cannot be more than 10 years apart.
Data unavailable: Weather data not available for specified location or time period.
usage: Provide latitude, longitude, start_date, and end_date. Optionally specify data_frequency. Returns comprehensive weather measurements for the specified location and time range.

timestamps.description: Array of datetime strings for each data point

wind_speed.description: Wind speed in kilometers per hour
